awards.title: Learning Awards: Onboarding programme of the Year Award 2023
awards.description:
Hosted by the LPI, the Learning Awards is widely regarded as the L&D sector’s premier awards ceremony. The 2023 awards received its highest ever number of submissions with entries from 56 countries. Fifty-four industry leaders formed the independent judging panel, who meticulously reviewed the hundreds of submissions to select the finalists and ultimate winners.

The Paint Me Orange Global Onboarding Programme, which has so far welcomed and set up 1,500+ Technology and Academic & Governments new joiners on their way for success as they start in their career at Elsevier. The programme is tailored to get new joiners up to speed, productive and connected as quickly as possible. It consists of a three half-day interactive programme that is rated a 9.6 by our new joiners, saving over 10.000 valuable hours from our hiring managers and helping with cost optimisations saving Elsevier around $13 Million in unproductive labour cost since its inception. Due to its innovative approach and accomplishments, it was therefore shortlisted as a finalist for The Learning Awards: Onboarding Programme of the Year 2023!

awards.title: Mastery of Scrum - User stories and Backlog management
awards.description: Many Product Owners seek help from their ScrumMaster and Agile coach because they struggling with these questions for example: How to write good user stories? And: How do I manage my backlog in the right way? In spending mastery Scrum May we focus on these questions. Kay Stevens (Enrise) and Niels Opdam (Prowareness) take you into an interactive knowledge sharing session along with answers and good practices on these questions. The Product Owner value game, the story mapping game or other practices introduced by you may pass by.

awards.title: Mastery of Scrum - Scaling Agile
Mastery of Scrum - Jira & backlog-tooling
awards.description: Master session regarding successful backlog management! We all know, after all, the principle of 'garbage in = garbage out. " Course is focussed on, among other, Jira and backlog management. In addition to an explanation of the tool itself, the course reflects on performing well backlog management. A must for the Product Owner, but also for team members and Scrum Masters!

awards.description: Crating and organising the first cuttin-edge technology tech conference for the BGL Group. Part of the organisational board arranging key speakers and logistics.

awards.title: Dutch Docker Day 2015
awards.description:
DevOps team presented our Docker CI/CD pipeline setup at the Dutch Docker days.

The current dogma about using Docker is that a container should run a single process and fulfill a single task. In this talk, we will share our experience in using Docker containers as a complete virtual machine running web servers, applications and yes even the MySQL database in a single container! These Docker virtual machines are used as the binary artifact that moves through a build pipeline for each feature branch and where the fastest way to move a traditional development process to a state of the art Continuous Delivery pipeline.

profile_positions.description:
Management of E-Commerce Product Development Department. Driver of digital change and Strategic steering of product portfolio. Linking pin between development, tactical roll-out and operational execution. Team target responsible and accountable. Implementing company wide Agile work methodology and building robust scalable multi country E-Commerce architecture through multiple multi-disciplinary Agile Scrum Delivery teams.

• Group alignment on new technology and exploitation for conversion optimisation and market disruptions.
• Exec board communication on complex (digital) issues.
• Experience within French, British and Dutch E-Commerce market.
• Management of large software projects, e-Commerce, SAAS (cloud), SOA, continuous delivery, DevOps.
• Translation and execution complex concepts in a concise manner.
• Driver of digital change and Strategic steering of product/engineering portfolio.
• Setup an Agile (SCRUM) department of 5 teams (45 online experts, 16 direct reports) in online product, disruption, sales, conversion optimisation (journeys) and technical development.
• Proven ability to build / lead productive multi-disciplinary teams (external and direct reports).
• A true motivational company team leader (Agile Champion), responsible for education and encouragement of teams to contribute and pick-up best practices.
• Translating and prioritising business, product and IT needs.
• Accelerating and implementation migration to new group platform.
• Operation transparency in a target and deadline driven environment.
• Alignment of stakeholders on product & technical roadmap.
• Strong trusted relationships with key internal stakeholders, and external parties.
• Setting strategic priorities and exploitation of best practices across other markets/countries.
• Staff communication, evaluation and personalised development.
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Development & Product Delivery

profile_positions.description:
inSided is the european leading provider of community software.

Responsible for project Implementation department. Implementing complex SAAS (Cloud) IT projects through multi disciplinary specialist teams on a global scale. Companywide project planning, Technical capacity planning, Stakeholder management, Agile implementation and dealing with External suppliers and Freelancers.

Closely collaborated with big respectable brands like Rabobank, REAAL, NS, Hi, KPN, Simyo, Telfort, UPC, Ziggo, Albert Heijn, Sonos, TomTom, ABN Amro, SNSBank, Sunweb, FBTO, Achmea, ZIlverenkruis, VOO, Meteor, EIRcom, Philips and T-Mobile.

Responsible for:
• Scale-up assistance from 8 to 70 people.
• Accelerating and implementing internal and external implementation project(s) on a global scale.
• Companywide implementation roadmap and inter-dependencies.
• Conversion targeting.
• Management of large software projects, SOA, continuous delivery, Agile, DevOps.
• Focusing on realising commercial performance KPIs within budget.
• Third party single point of trust and confidence.
• High-pressure corporate deadline driven environment.
• Implementation of 30+ deadline driven corporate large-scale international roll-outs (e.a. KPN, Ziggo, NS, see above for more).
• Significant cost reduction and increased efficiency by implementing a Hybrid Agile Scrum methodology.
• Scalable architecture and cost reduction by delivering SAAS platform running on AWS.
• Lead-time reduction in getting product(s) before deadlines.
• Business strategy influencer by creating solid financial models through analytical data.
• Conducting market research to identify and prioritise key roadmap disruptive products.
• 100% on-time project delivery.
• Transformation: Employee/team satisfaction from 6.4 to 7.8.
• Transformation: Focus on personal development.
• Demonstrated strong analytical and problem solving skills (multiple corporate client environment in single SAAS environment.
